title: Transaction Result
name: TransactionResult
description: A class holding information about a transaction result.

parameters.name: transaction
parameters.notes:
A constructor for TransactionResult

A transaction result contains: statusMessage, type, financialStatus, requestedAmount, gratuityAmount, gratuityPercentage, totalAmount, currency, transactionID, eFTTransactionID, originalEFTTransactionID, eFTTimestamp, authorisationCode, verificationMethod, cardEntryType, cardSchemeName, errorMessage, customerReference, budgetNumber, merchantReceipt and customerReceipt

properties.name: StatusMessage
properties.description: Gets the statusMessage from the TransactionResult

properties.name: Type
properties.description: Gets the transaction type from the TransactionResult

properties.name: FinStatus
properties.description: Gets the financial status from the TransactionResult

properties.name: RequestedAmount
properties.description: Gets the requested amount from the TransactionResult

properties.name: GratuityAmount
properties.description: Gets the gratuity amount from the TransactionResult

properties.name: GratuityPercentage
properties.description: Gets the gratuity percentage from the TransactionResult

properties.name: TotalAmount
properties.description: Gets the total amount from the TransactionResult

properties.name: Currency
properties.description: Gets the currency from the TransactionResult

properties.name: TransactionID
properties.description: Gets the device transaction id from the TransactionResult

properties.name: eFTTransactionID
properties.description: Gets the device transaction id from the TransactionResult

properties.name: OriginalEFTTransactionID
properties.description: Gets the original EFT transaction id from the TransactionResult

properties.name: eFTTimestamp
properties.description: Gets the time stamp from the TransactionResult

properties.name: AuthorisationCode
properties.description: Gets the authorisation code from the TransactionResult

properties.name: VerificationMethod
properties.description: Gets the verification method from the TransactionResult

properties.name: CardEntryType
properties.description: Gets the card entry type from the TransactionResult

properties.name: CardSchemeName
properties.description: Gets the card scheme name from the TransactionResult

properties.name: ErrorMessage
properties.description: Gets the error message from the TransactionResult

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Gets the error message from the TransactionResult

properties.name: CustomerReference
properties.description: Gets the customer reference from the TransactionResult

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Gets the budget number from the TransactionResult

properties.name: BudgetNumber
properties.description: Gets the budget number from the TransactionResult

properties.name: MerchantReceipt
properties.description: Gets the merchant receipt from the TransactionResult

properties.name: CustomerReceipt
properties.description: Gets the customer receipt from the TransactionResult

properties.name: DeviceStatus
properties.description: Gets the device status from the TransactionResult
